snippet: New York City pharmacies struggled to meet the demand for flu vaccinations a day after a public health emergency was declared for the state.
abstract: New York City pharmacies are struggling to meet the demand for flu vaccinations after New York State declared a public health emergency; city Health Department says it can not provide data on availability of vaccines; Gov Andrew M Cuomo's emergency declaration temporarily suspends state law that prohibits pharmacists from vaccinating children.
lead_paragraph: New York City pharmacies struggled to meet the demand for flu vaccinations a day after a public health emergency was declared for the state.

headline.seo: Pharmacies Pressed to Meet High Demand for Flu Vaccine
headline.main: Pharmacies Pressed to Meet High Demand for Flu Vaccine
headline.print_headline: Pharmacies Pressed to Meet High Demand for Flu Vaccine
